data.meta_description: Great team that I‚Äôm fortunate to be able to work with every day. Proud of what we have accomplished together and excited about what the future holds! #techtron‚Ä¶
data.text:
I am pumped about what's new to Vistaly this week. If you're building opportunity solution trees, impact maps, KPI trees, or using trees to visualize product processes or business systems, check this out. We've been working with customers to build tools that get out of your way, so you can focus on building strategy and discovery systems that work. What does "getting out of the way" mean in this context? - More than short-lived whiteboarding artifacts, you know, the ones that started as a brainstorming doc but evolved into something‚Ä¶ else. - Shareable without requiring a personal guided 1:1 tour. - ALWAYS clean, organized, and structured without spending minutes dragging boxes around each time you want to make a meaningful change. - Scales past the one or two people who spent time building the thing. - It doesn't lock your data inside, requiring double or triple entry to get information where it needs to go. - Quickly see what changed, when, and by whom. On to what‚Äôs new! Let's say you've been capturing customer insights and identifying opportunities, your tree's getting big, the team is committed to addressing several opportunities, and you're responsible for a few. Imagine taking a tree of 100-200 cards (multiple opportunity solution trees, KPI trees, etc.) and minimizing it to the 2-5 areas you care about. Then imagine you can explore from there to learn more or get a refresher. Wouldn‚Äôt that be cool üòâ We have some use cases that we'll be sharing over the next few days. Follow along and check them out ‚Äì Vistaly #productdiscovery #product #productdevelopment

After getting inspired last week about ways to make Insights work harder, I came across Vistaly and decided to keep going beyond reporting. In my experience, some companies churn and burn through their insights, potentially reducing their value. By keeping them siloed, it not only adds complexity but misses overarching themes that can drive new value when put together. üõéÔ∏è Cue: Insights Curation First - what is it? üìà Making Insights activation easier for business stakeholders to refine and execute their roadmaps quicker So - why might it be needed? üóøProduct example: Sprawling customer/user insights adding to a product manager‚Äôs new product development technical debt. Great - what‚Äôs the takeaway? üßÆ Leverage better information architecture: Molding findings into pruned impact maps and opportunity solution trees that blueprint product development priorities. #productdevelopment #productmanagement #informationarchitecture #customerinsights

üåü Sprintform Spotlighted in Behaviour Magazine! We are excited to share that Sprintform has been featured in Behaviour - a HR-magazine! This recognition comes from our innovative approach to bridging business strategy with technology. üéØ Leadership and Vision: In the feature, our founder and CEO, Andras Berczeli, shares insights into the motivations behind Sprintform's inception and its successful journey since 2019. Under his leadership, we've focused on delivering digital solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations. üöÄ Technological and Team Insights: Our Chief Technology Officer, Merc√©desz Sztanojev, discusses our agile operational advantages and the challenges we've overcome. Her insights into motivating tech sector employees and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement illustrate our commitment to excellence. üåâ Bridging Gaps: A core part of our strategy has been to utilize cross-functional teams to create a conduit between business needs and IT solutions, ensuring that our projects are not only about software development but about delivering comprehensive solutions that align perfectly with client goals. üí´ Strategic Expansion: Over the past year, we've not only moved to a new office but also strategically expanded our workforce amid fluctuating market conditions. This careful expansion has helped us increase our revenue by 25% in 2023 despite a 30% reduction in staff numbers, showcasing our resilience and adaptability. This year we have a solid space for growth. üåê Evolving Service Offerings: Looking forward, we're excited to broaden our horizons beyond just delivering digital solutions. Our aim is to leverage our extensive experience in digital strategy formulation and execution, assisting clients from the planning phase through to implementation with our consulting team. This expansion includes opening up based on existing experiences in data and processes consulting and pioneering work with the latest technologies like mixed reality and artificial intelligence. As we blend our business and employer branding strategies, we offer not only attractive services to our clients but also exciting professional challenges to our team. This dual approach ensures that Sprintform remains a compelling place to work and partner with. Read the full Hungarian article (see link as a comment) to learn more about our journey and the exciting future we envision at Sprintform. #Sprintform #Innovation #TeamEfficiency #TechnologyLeadership #FutureOfWork

Your kind of webinar where you can ask unlimited questions whether you are an aspiring PM or would like to transition to PM roles from a mid/senior level or at an entry-level. Our speakers are joining globally from RazorPay, Easy Pay, TookiTaki and more. Learn and crack your PM interview. And like that, it is already March again and the 3rd months of the new year is starting. Where have the last 60 days gone? If you want to learn more about how you can make your project workflows more efficient and have a CDE that allows to have "one true source of truth"?
